Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Sometimes I found my teachers feedback contradictory and so I would be confused as to how to improve my assessments. With GenAI however, the feedback is very specific and easier for me to understand.
